description: Realistic long email with ETA buried in text
subject: RE: ETA Request - PO-2024-005
body:
Hi,

I checked with the driver and here's the latest. He had to stop for a DOT inspection at the weigh station outside of Katy but he's back on the road now. He said everything went fine, no issues with the truck or paperwork.

Based on where he is right now he should be pulling into the site around 4:30 PM. I'll have him call the site contact 30 minutes before arrival.

Let me know if you need anything else.

Best regards,
Tom Henderson
Dispatch Manager
Nationwide Fuel Transport
(817) 555-0245
note: LLM correctly ignores phone number digits; regex matches '0245' from (817) 555-0245 as military time

subject: RE: ETA Request - PO-2024-001
